ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3" Sony Effio CCD, Color DSP. NTSC system
700TV Lines high horizontal resolution
0.1 lux Minimum Illumination for low light view
Electronic shutter: Auto iris. Can be mounted on the wall or ceiling
Package included: 1 of Sony Effio CCD box camera, 1 of 3.5-8mm Varifocal lens, 1 of 12V DC power supply, 1 of universal mounting bracket, 1 of video power extension cable and 1 of bonus warning sticker
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Security Camera Built-in 1/3" SONY Effio CCD 700TVL High Resolution for CCTV DVR Home Surveillance System with 3.5-8mm Vari-focal Lens, Camera Bracket, Power Supply and Extension Cable CSQ
